author: freeCodeCamp.org
description:
Learn to speak the French language!

Course developed by @LearnfrenchwithGeorges 

Download lesson files and key learning on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/posts/french-class-a1-116059236

❤️ Support for this channel comes from our friends at Scrimba – the coding platform that's reinvented interactive learning: https://scrimba.com/freecodecamp

Contents
- 00:00:00 Course Introduction & Overview
- 00:01:05 Les Salutations (Greetings)
- 00:13:59 Se Présenter (Introducing Oneself)
- 00:26:34 Verbs Connaître, Être, Parler (To Know, To Be, To Speak)
- 00:36:40 Les Questions avec "Est-ce que" (Questions with "Is it that")
- 00:45:00 Revision
- 00:53:29 DELF A1 Exercises (Self-Presentation)
- 01:00:41 J'aime, Je N'aime Pas (Likes and Dislikes)
- 01:10:33 Quel Âge Avez-Vous? & Questions (Age & Identity)
- 01:19:33 Verbes Aller et Venir (To Go and To Come)
- 01:29:45 Verbes Être et Avoir (To Be and To Have)
- 01:39:54 Il Est Comment? (Describing Someone)
- 01:50:23 Le Français dans le Monde
title: Complete French Language Beginners Course – Learn A1 Level French

author: freeCodeCamp.org
description: Pop quiz: does '5' equal 5 in code? Ania explains here.
title: Pop quiz: does '5' equal 5 in code?
